actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 73 of title 10 of the United States Code in order to make the survivor benefit plan applicable to certain persons who meet all requirements, but for age, for nonregular retired pay.

summary.text: Provides for making the Survivor Benefit Plan applicable to retired members of the Armed Forces who are age 55 and meet all other requirements for nonregular retired pay.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 73 of title 10 of the United States Code in order to make the survivor benefit plan applicable to certain persons who meet all requirements, but for age, for nonregular retired pay.
